alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 17 at 4:45PM EDT until June 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 386 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHERN MARYLAND ST. MARYS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA ALBEMARLE CITY OF CHARLOTTESVILLE KING GEORGE NELSON ORANGE SPOTSYLVANIA IN WESTERN VIRGINIA AUGUSTA CITY OF STAUNTON CITY OF WAYNESBORO HIGHLAND THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF CALIFORNIA, CHARLOTTESVILLE, CROZET, DAHLGREN, GORDONSVILLE, GREENFIELD, LEXINGTON PARK, MONTEREY, ORANGE, SPOTSYLVANIA COURTHOUSE, STAUNTON, STAUNTON, WAYNESBORO, AND WAYNESBORO.
